item.title: Daily Podcast 2026-02-28
item.description: BioStruct-Africa is a community-driven initiative aimed at building structural biology capacity across Africa through hands-on training in cutting-edge techniques like AlphaFold, X-ray crystallography, cryo-EM, and drug design. | The demand for this training is striking. | Learning outcomes were strong.
item.itunes:author: Eva Dai
item.itunes:summary: BioStruct-Africa is a community-driven initiative aimed at building structural biology capacity across Africa through hands-on training in cutting-edge techniques like AlphaFold, X-ray crystallography, cryo-EM, and drug design. | The demand for this training is striking. | Learning outcomes were strong.
